document.full_text: record flooding in parts of the u.s. red river valley has slowed grain movement, but lake-like fields are nothing new to farmers who battle flooding on some scale each spring, industry officials said.
document.title: red river floods fields, but u.s. farmers ready
lines_and_colors: record flooding in parts of the u.s. red river valley has slowed grain movement, but lake-like fields are nothing new to farmers who battle flooding on some scale each spring, industry officials said.
